room_title: Escape room "The Hexadron" by The Escape • Des Moines in Des Moines
review: Went to do the Informant which was awesome :) First time doing an escape room and had a great time. Kaitlyn was our game host and she was amazing - great energy, great job giving clues. We ended up scheduling another one for a few days later! We did the Hexadron which was also fun and our game host, Nate, was awesome. The rooms are cool and have fun backstories and everyone on the staff we talked to was lovely. Definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The Hexadron" by The Escape • Des Moines in Des Moines
review: This was so fun! I loved the theme (the four of us did the Hexadron room), and the puzzles were the perfect level of challenging! It was so cool to see the different types of puzzles there were. Everything was so creative and engaging. And the staff there was really friendly and enthusiastic! I will definitely be going here again!

room_title: Escape room "The Hexadron" by The Escape • Des Moines in Des Moines
review: The Hexadron was very fun! We had a great time and the staff (Claire) was helpful and friendly.

room_title: Escape room "The Hexadron" by The Escape • Des Moines in Des Moines
review: We did the Hexadron and had a blast. We finished with :40 to spare! Challenging but enough going on that the whole family including my seven year old could get involved and participate. We will definitely do this again. Staff (Claire) was friendly and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "The Hexadron" by The Escape • Des Moines in Des Moines
review: My mom, sister and I love escape rooms and The Escape was not one to disappoint! After completing The Psych Ward, we decided to do another and took Josh's advice and did the Hexadron. Both rooms were fun but challenging and Josh was very pleasant and gave us just the right amount of clues. We will definitely be back!
